Interface IMenuActionManager

Interface with additional methods of manager for menu action model.

Inheritance: IManager<T, TService> -> IMenuActionManager
Implementations: MenuActionManager 

public interface IMenuActionManager : IManager<MenuAction, MenuActionService>
Inherited Members
IManager<MenuAction, MenuActionService>.SelectedItem

IManager<MenuAction, MenuActionService>.DisplayTitle()
IManager<MenuAction, MenuActionService>.Select(int)

Methods

EnterOrEsc()

Asks user whether he/she wants to go back to main menu or exit the program completely. If user presses Esc "Exit" menu action is selected. If user presses Enter (or anything else, other that Esc ), "DisplayMainMenu" menu action is selected.

void EnterOrEsc()
See Also
MenuActionService
IManager<T, TService>
MenuActionManager
MenuAction

GoToMainMenu()

Selects "DisplayMainMenu" menu action.

void GoToMainMenu()
See Also
MenuActionService
IManager<T, TService>
MenuActionManager
MenuAction

Select()

Selects menu action.

MenuAction? Select()

Returns

MenuAction

Selected menu action or null if user failed to select existing action.

Remarks

Displays appropriate menu (elements of collection with Menu value equal selected item's NextMenu value. Asks user to select one element and sets it as selected item.
